name: Alligato Mobile
overview:
Introducing the Mobetize™ Platform The Alligato solution is the only mobile platform and framework that enables companies to future-proof their mobile strategy from the fragmented device/ OS marketplace and integrates mobile marketing, e-commerce business transaction logic, complex carrier-grade billing, and multiple payment methods on all mobile devices.

Our Product Suite includes: Mobile SMS/QR code engagement tools Mobile web application development Mobile shopping cart and checkout Mobile payment processing engine Mobile My Account Management Mobile Self Checkout Mobile Virtual POS Mobile Metrics

We market our solution to payment solutions providers and merchants to meet the growing demand and shift of tradional PC based ecommerce to mobile commerce.
